name: response/resups
description: UPS shipping & Paperless Invoice module for OXID eShop: create shipping labels in admin, configure UPS service per shipping set, and add a GDPR consent checkbox in checkout.

suggest.commercial-license: The full version is available via https://www.response-gmbh.de/oxid-ups-modul/oxid-version/oxid-ce-pe-6.x (license required).
